Name: assign_user_story_to_sprint
Description: Binary decision if a user story is in a sprint

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: Binary selection of a feature into a release

Name: task_hours
Description: Continuous hours allocated to a task

Name: set_story_points
Description: Integer adjustment of story points for planning

Name: team_capacity
Description: Integer capacity (points) planned for a sprint

Name: deploy_increment
Description: Binary decision to deploy a development snapshot

Name: prioritize_epic_rank
Description: Integer rank position of an epic in backlog

Name: feature_priority_rank
Description: Integer rank position of a feature in backlog

Name: activate_blocker_resolution
Description: Binary flag to trigger blocker resolution workflow

Name: set_review_attendees
Description: Integer target number of review attendees

Name: set_number_of_tasks
Description: Integer number of tasks planned for sprint backlog

Name: set_total_effort
Description: Continuous total effort planned for sprint backlog
